org.hps.readout.hodoscope

Class HodoscopePreprocessingDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.readout.ReadoutDriver
        • org.hps.readout.hodoscope.HodoscopePreprocessingDriver

  • public class HodoscopePreprocessingDriver
extends ReadoutDriver
    HodoscopeEnergySplitDriver handles the preprocessing of hodoscope hits from SLIC. It is responsible for converting the hits from SimTrackerHit objects into SimCalorimeterHit objects. It is also responsible for converting hits from scintillator-based channels to those that match the FADC channels in the hardware. This entails splitting the energy of those hits where the physical scintillator feeds into multiple FADC channels.

      • getTimeDisplacement

        protected double getTimeDisplacement()
        Description copied from class: ReadoutDriver
        Specifies the amount of simulation time that the driver needs to produce its output. This indicates that the driver's present output was generated based on input a time equal to (getCurrentTime() - getTimeDisplacement()).
        Specified by:
        getTimeDisplacement in class ReadoutDriver
        Returns:
        Returns the time displacement of output data as a double.

      • getTimeNeededForLocalOutput

        protected double getTimeNeededForLocalOutput()
        Description copied from class: ReadoutDriver
        Specifies the amount of simulation time that the driver needs to produce special on-trigger data.
        Specified by:
        getTimeNeededForLocalOutput in class ReadoutDriver
        Returns:
        Returns the time displacement of output data as a double.

      • getHolePositionArrayIndex

        private static final int getHolePositionArrayIndex(HodoscopeChannel channel)
                                            throws IllegalArgumentException
        Translates a hole index into a form usable in an array.
        Parameters:
        channel - - A hodoscope channel.
        Returns:
        Returns a value of 0 for the hole closest to the calorimeter center and a value of 1 for hole closest to the positron-side of the calorimeter.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Occurs if the input channel either has an unrecognized hole number, or only has one hole.

      • makeHit

        private static final SimCalorimeterHit makeHit(SimTrackerHit hit,
                                               int cellID)
        Creates a SimCalorimeterHit object from an input SimTrackerHit object. The new hit will have the same truth information, but will have the cell ID specified instead.
        Parameters:
        hit - - The hit to convert.
        cellID - - The new cell ID for the hit.
        Returns:
        Returns a new SimCalorimeterHit object that represents the same data as the input RawTrackerHit object.

      • makeHit

        private static final SimCalorimeterHit makeHit(SimTrackerHit hit,
                                               int cellID,
                                               double energyScale)
        Creates a SimCalorimeterHit object from an input SimTrackerHit object. The new hit will have the same truth information, but will have the cell ID specified and also its energy will be scaled by the amount indicated by energyScale.
        Parameters:
        hit - - The hit to convert.
        cellID - - The new cell ID for the hit.
        energyScale - - The amount by which the energy should be scaled.
        Returns:
        Returns a new SimCalorimeterHit object that represents the same data as the input RawTrackerHit object, but with the energy scaled as specified.
